wikipedia_page.main: Samuel Pepper (born 26 March 1989) is a British internet personality, prankster, TikToker and former YouTuber. He created his YouTube channel in 2010, which has accumulated over 2 million subscribers and 55 million video views as of October 2020. No new content has been uploaded to his channel since March of 2017. Pepper has since amassed more than 4 million followers on TikTok as of October 2021.
